Question: AUKEY CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AUKEY

3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Chargers

- Three models tailored to Apple users
- Each charger provides up to 15W fast charging for iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch
- Models include basic, pro with active-cooling technology, and slim foldable
- Full compatibility with Qi2 and Made for Watch (MFW) certification
- Minimalist aesthetic with adjustable viewing angle
- Can charge any Qi-compatible device
- Available soon
- Company website: www.aukey.com
